FROM BRT_COR_MST a LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST b ON a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID
COR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || COR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
COR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
COR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT CONCAT('AR', LPAD(NEXTVAL(SEQ_BMS_VOC_RSV_INFO_0), 8, '0')) AS 'SEQ'
SELECT COR_ID ,COR_NM FROM BRT_COR_MST

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.COMP_ID ,A.CHAS_NO ,A.AREA ,A.MAKER ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RELS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RELS_DT ,A.MODEL_NM ,A.ROUT_TYPE ,A.VHC_TYPE ,A.VHC_KIND ,A.VHC_FUEL ,A.REMARK ,IF(C.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) RSV_STATE ,B.MNG_ID ,C.RSV_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(D.RSV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RSV_DT ,IF(A.USE_YN = 'Y', '사용', NULL) USE_YN ,E.COMP_NM FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VOC_RSV_RST_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN BMS_VOC_RSV_INFO D ON C.RSV_ID = D.RSV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON A.COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY A.VHC_ID ORDER BY A.VHC_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_VOC_RSV_RST_INFO SET PROCE_RST = 'PR008' , SEND_DTM = NOW() , COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE RSV_ID = #{RSV_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT DVC.MNG_ID ,DVC.DVC_ID FROM BMS_VHC_MST VHC LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID WHERE MNG_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT A.VHC_ID , SUBSTRING(A.MNG_ID, 1, 10) AS IMP_ID , A.DVC_ID , A.MNG_ID , A.DVC_KIND , B.DL_CD , B.DL_CD_NM , B.TXT_VAL1 , B.TXT_VAL2 , B.TXT_VAL3 , B.NUM_VAL4 , B.NUM_VAL5 , B.NUM_VAL6 FROM BMS_DVC_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.DVC_KIND = B.DL_CD WHERE A.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND B.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND B.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.ROUT_ID , A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.INT_ROUT_ID , A.REP_ROUT_NM , A.ROUT_NM , A.WAY_DIV , B.TXT_VAL1 FROM BMS_ROUT_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.WAY_DIV = B.DL_CD AND B.CO_CD = 'WAY_DIV' WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routeId}
SELECT A.COR_ID , A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.COR_NM , B.ROUT_ID , B.ROUT_SN FROM BRT_COR_MST A LEFT JOIN BRT_COR_DTL_INFO B ON A.COR_ID = B.COR_ID WHERE A.COR_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY COR_ID, ROUT_SN

SELECT DISTINCT A.NODE_ID , A.NODE_NM , IFNULL(B.TXT_VAL1, (SELECT TXT_VAL1 FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE DL_CD = 'NT003')) AS NODE_TYPE , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(A.GPS_X, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(A.GPS_Y, 6) AS Y FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST R ON A.ROUT_ID = R.ROUT_ID AND R.DEL_YN !='Y' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.NODE_TYPE = B.DL_CD WHERE A.NODE_TYPE IN ('NT001', 'NT003', 'NT004', 'NT007');

SELECT DISTINCT STTN_ID AS NODE_ID , REPLACE(STTN_NM, ',', '.') AS NODE_NM , '1' AS 'NODE_TYPE' , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(GPS_X, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(GPS_Y, 6) AS Y , IFNULL(REPLACE(STTN_ENM, ',', '.'), '') AS NODE_ENAME , IF(IFNULL(IF(LINE_CNT >= 3, 2, LINE_CNT -1), 0) < 0, 0, IFNULL(IF(LINE_CNT >= 3, 2, LINE_CNT -1), 0)) AS TRANSIT_CODE , IFNULL(B.TXT_VAL1, "") AS DOOR FROM (BMS_STTN_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.VHC_DOOR_DIR_TYPE = B.DL_CD AND A.DEL_YN!='Y') WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT ORGA_ID AS NODE_ID , REPLACE(ORGA_NM, ',', '.') AS NODE_NM , '898' AS 'NODE_TYPE' , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(GPS_X, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(GPS_Y, 6) AS Y , "" AS NODE_ENAME , "" AS TRANSIT_CODE , "" AS DOOR FROM BMS_VOC_ORGA_INFO WHERE GPS_X IS NOT NULL AND GPS_Y IS NOT NULL

SELECT IF(A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT006', A.ORGA_ID, A.NODE_ID) AS NODE_ID FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST R ON A.ROUT_ID = R.ROUT_ID AND R.DEL_YN !='Y' WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{routId} ORDER BY NODE_SN ASC

SELECT A.LINK_ID AS LINK_ID , IFNULL(B.ST_NODE_ID, "") AS ST_NODE , IFNULL(B.ED_NODE_ID, "") AS ED_NODE , IFNULL(B.LEN, "") AS LEN , IFNULL(B.MAX_SPD, (SELECT TXT_VAL1 FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'SYS_INFO' AND DL_CD = 'SY013')) AS MAX_SPD , IFNULL(C.TXT_VAL1, "") AS EVENT_MS FROM BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_LINK_MST B ON A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO C ON A.MORN_STD = C.DL_CD WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} ORDER BY LINK_SN

SELECT B.ORGA_ID AS ORGA_ID , REPLACE(B.ORGA_NM, ',', '.') AS ORGA_NM , IFNULL(B.REMARK, "") AS REMARK FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST R ON A.ROUT_ID = R.ROUT_ID AND R.DEL_YN !='Y' LEFT JOIN BMS_VOC_ORGA_INFO B ON A.ORGA_ID = B.ORGA_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND NODE_TYPE = 'NT006'

SELECT A.ORGA_ID AS 'ORGA_ID' , A.SN AS 'SEQ' , CAST(C.NUM_VAL4 AS INTEGER) AS 'VOC_CODE' , IFNULL(A.VOC_ID, "") AS 'VOC_ID' , IFNULL(B.PLAY_TYPE, "") AS 'PLAY_TYPE' , IFNULL(B.PLAY_ST_DT, "") AS 'START_DATE' , IFNULL(B.PLAY_ED_DT, "") AS 'EXPIRE_DATE' , IFNULL(B.SCR_TXT, "") AS 'TEXT' , IFNULL(B.SCR_TXT_EN, "") AS 'EN_TEXT' FROM BMS_VOC_ORGA_LIST A LEFT JOIN BMS_VOC_INFO B ON A.VOC_ID = B.VOC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO C ON B.VOC_DIV = C.DL_CD WHERE A.ORGA_ID = #{orgaId} AND B.PLAY_ED_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BMS_INNER_LED_INFO WHERE VOC_ID = CONCAT(#{value})
SELECT COR_ID , ROUT_SN AS SEQ , ROUT_ID FROM BRT_COR_DTL_INFO WHERE COR_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY SEQ ASC

SELECT ROUT_ID AS FILE_NAME , REPLACE(ROUT_NM, ',', '.') AS ROUT_NM , REPLACE(ROUT_NM, ',', '.') AS ROUT_ENM , CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y%m%d'), 3), "00") AS VERSION , IFNULL(DVC_NM, "") AS DESTI_NO , IFNULL(C.TXT_VAL1, "") AS ROUT_SHAPE , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(MIN(ROUT_ST_TM), " ~ ", MAX(ROUT_ST_TM)), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY001') AS DAY1 , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT('1일 ', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR), '회 운행'), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY001') AS DAY2 , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(MIN(ROUT_ST_TM), " ~ ", MAX(ROUT_ST_TM)), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY002') AS SATDAY1 , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT('1일 ', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR), '회 운행'), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY002') AS SATDAY2 , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(MIN(ROUT_ST_TM), " ~ ", MAX(ROUT_ST_TM)), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY002') AS SUNDAY1 , (SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT('1일 ', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR), '회 운행'), "") FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND DAY_DIV = 'DY002') AS SUNDAY2 , REP_ROUT_NM AS REP_NAME FROM BMS_ROUT_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.WAY_DIV = B.DL_CD AND B.CO_CD = 'WAY_DIV' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO C ON A.SHAPE_DIV = C.DL_CD AND C.CO_CD = 'SHAPE_DIV' WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId}
SELECT REMARK FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'KEY_API' AND DL_CD = 'KA002'
